BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this mammogram image appears to be heterogeneously dense.
FINDINGS: There is a round, well-circumscribed opacity with regular margins and a density similar to fat seen in the upper outer quadrant of the left breast. This finding is suggestive of a benign fibroadenoma or a benign fat-containing hamartoma. However, short-term follow-up is recommended to confirm stability.
